name: Pokémon Dark Shiny
description: You are trapped in a tower on the island of Alunia, accused of having stolen a very rare pokémon, and have to find a way to escape from that place. But one thing stands in their way, the Zheryon team, they will not stop until they have the power of the most powerful legendary pokémon in their hands. Are you ready to break through the new region of Zellos, capture all the Pokémon, and still stop the evil ambitions of this evil team? A dark pokémon will reveal its reverse form, you will need more than courage for what is to come.
